original_text: A noise shall come even to the ends of the earth; for the Lord hath a controversy with the nations, he will plead with all flesh; he will give them that are wicked to the sword, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 요란한 소리가 땅 끝까지 이름은 여호와께서 뭇 민족과 다투시며 모든 육체를 심판하시며 악인을 칼에 내어 주셨음이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: even to the ends of the earth
for the Lord hath a controversy with the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 민족들과 쟁론이 계시기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: he will plead with all flesh
he will give them that are wicked to the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 악한 자들을 칼에 넘기실 것이다
